sub_title:
EFL teacher trainer, Academic Reading and Writing specialist
 CELTA & ELE certified teacher
summary: Contributed with many trainees in their process to become EFL teachers. I have a passion to teach academic Reading and Writing to help professionals develop their careers. I love presenting language as the every day tool it is which anyone can use to express thoughts, emotions and needs. Now, I am exploring the world of teaching my mother tongue, Spanish as a foreign language which is amazing and with a lot of potential.

'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Universidad Pedagógica Experimental Libertador', 'description': 'Academic work consisted on teaching, several times, all five basic-level courses of language acquisition and both courses of Reading and Writing; it also included teaching a conversation seminar, and a course of Evaluation in the Teaching of English as a Foreign Language.
Administrative work consisted of a variety of activities along those years:
	Coordination of team-planning efforts of all language acquisition courses, at least once, where apart from regular classroom teaching, line-managed teachers and supervised their work in the classroom, or language laboratory.
	Coordination of department teachers in their role of student counselors for a year and a half. The job of the counselors’ coordinator consists on serving as a liaison between the institutional counseling program and every teacher-counselor in the department. Such connection seeks to effectively redirect all the information in regards to students’ guidance and planning for their accomplishing the required objectives of the career in order to obtain the degree of Teachers of English. This position also involves dealing and assessing students with their initial or final registration process every term when their counselors cannot be located.
	Academic coordination of the English program for two years and a half. The academic coordinator is in charge of synchronizing, managing and supervising all the different academical roles and work of the Chairs of the Program to ensure they all fulfill the University objectives. This post also works as a liaison between students, teachers and the rest of the institutional offices, whether those are located in the same campus, the headquarters, or at different branches in the country. Another part of this job involved being part of different committees,.', 'title': 'English Language Teacher Trainer', 'employment_type': None}]}]
